ai-tha-ap416:2.1_0: Having gone together, having gone together,
ai-tha-ap416:2.4_0: at the end of the Community of monks
ai-tha-ap416:3.3_0: This almsbowl is to be filled with this bowl.
ai-tha-ap416:4.1_0: After eating it at the wrong time,
ai-tha-ap416:4.2_0: you’ve been accused like a tortoise:
ai-tha-ap416:5.1_0: filling my mind with confidence in him,
ai-tha-ap416:5.2_0: I went to the realm of the Thirty-Three.
ai-tha-ap416:5.3_0: After eating, drinking (them) in that place,
ai-tha-ap416:6.1_0: you’re stricken by the root of a tree,
ai-tha-ap416:6.4_0: he rules on so long as he wants.
ai-tha-ap416:7.1_0: this is my last state of existence.
ai-tha-ap416:7.3_0: Well, though I’m not being keen in this way,
ai-tha-ap416:8.1_0: because of that in the past life.
ai-tha-ap416:9.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap416:9.4_0: this is the fruit for the honey.
ai-tha-ap416:11.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap416:13.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Macchikāsaṇḍa.
